name: Harrowed Ground
description: Harrowed Ground is a precursor to a larger future release within the same IP. It is a text based adventure game, with both visual-novel elements including lockpicking mechanics and turn based combat. In this early release, the game follows the main character on their first outing with the purpose of prepping to rob the great vaults in their city and sew chaos among the nobles of Orichalc, the City of Brass
